description: PM Giuseppe Conte targets public gatherings, hospitality and recreation "to avoid a new lockdown".
title: Covid-19: Italy tightens rules after coronavirus cases surge
title_page: Covid-19: Italy tightens rules after coronavirus cases surge - BBC News
maintext: The Czech Republic said on Sunday it would wait two weeks before deciding on whether a full lockdown was needed. The country currently has the highest coronavirus infection rate in Europe and has closed most of the hospitality sector and moved schools to distance-learning.
